hero.title: Welcome to Clipposaurus
hero.description: Clipposaurus is your instant, no-signup digital clipboard with end-to-end. Share text, code, and files (up to 50MB total) across devices using a drop key. You have access for your drop up to 1 hour.

sections.title: What Makes Us Different?
sections.description: Clipposaurus reimagines file sharing for the modern web. Unlike traditional services that require accounts, track your behavior, and store your data indefinitely, we built a system that prioritizes your privacy and security above everything else.

rows: Completely anonymous - no cookies, no profiles

sections.title: Privacy by Design (Not by Promise)
sections.description: Unlike apps that promise to protect your data, Clipposaurus is architected so we literally CAN'T see your content - even if we wanted to. Here's how our zero-knowledge design works:

data.title: Generate Your Secret Key
data.description: Privacy starts with you controlling the key

data.title: Encrypt Before Upload
data.description: Content scrambled before it leaves your device

data.title: Store Only Encrypted Data
data.description: We store gibberish, never your real data

data.title: Decrypt on Your Device
data.description: Content revealed only on your device

sections.title: What You Can Share?
sections.description: Discover the variety of content you can securely share with Clipposaurus, from simple text notes to complex code snippets and any format files.

sections.title: We Can't Spy (Even If We Tried)
sections.description: We don't just say we protect privacy. We can't violate it even if we wanted to.

panels.title: Why This Matters
items: Can't sell your data (we don't have it)
No government data requests (nothing to give)

sections.title: Works Everywhere, Always
sections.description: Clipposaurus is built as a progressive web app that works seamlessly across all modern devices and browsers. No downloads, no installations, no app stores - just visit the website and start sharing instantly.

sections.title: Real People, Real Uses
sections.description: See how real users from different walks of life leverage Clipposaurus for their everyday sharing needs. From students collaborating on projects to developers sharing code snippets, discover the practical applications that make Clipposaurus indispensable.

data.title: Students
data.quote: Share assignments between laptop and phone. Group projects without email chains.

data.title: Developers
data.quote: Code snippets during pair programming. Confidential docs without corporate email. Works even in locked-down environments.

data.title: Privacy First Users
data.quote: Share sensitive notes or documents without relying on email or big cloud providers. Zero-knowledge = peace of mind.

data.title: Everyone Else
data.quote: Move things between phone, tablet, laptop, and desktop effortlessly. Great for people who switch devices all day.
